attributes.title: THIS APP IS RACIST
attributes.review: This app is a RACIST to me. It keep telling to to go back to my Country. I tried to delete this app but, it keep telling me to “go back to your country first”. I did not listen to it, so I’m writing a review then I’m going to but a new phone. Also...I hate trump

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Absolutely TERRIBLE. It’s an outrage This app was so confusing. I couldn’t sign up for ANYTHING. It took FOREVER to download just in general crap. I would give it zero stars if I could you know. And I am NOT a part of the “gen z” stuff, I just wanted to be a good human. 🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏿🧚🏽‍♂️

attributes.title: Um I got herpes?!?!
attributes.review: Ok so I just want to start off saying I whole heartedly suport trump 🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷but like it took a whole week to download aaaaaand my friends and family got herpes!! Coincidence? I THINK NOT! So as a conclusion, I say that this app took a week to download just to give me herpes.

attributes.title: Awful App Do Not Download!!!
attributes.review: Kept crashing every-time I opened the app! Plus it took forever to download and was so slow to load anything in app. Poor design and should not be downloaded.

attributes.title: trump why
attributes.review: i was so excited when i found out about this app but then it took 24 hours to download and that just was no fun. not to mention once i downloaded it i got a strange phone call from someone claiming to be the president. so i don’t think that this is really trumps app i’m pretty sure this is a fake trump app because it has its own blm tab and trump isn’t down with that. you know because he’s yt and fat.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This “app” (if you can even call it that) it’s the WORST thing I’ve ever experienced. It constantly crashes and promotes racism. It also has a terrible design with EXTREMELY poor construction. If I could rate it 0/5 I would!! Beware, STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP!!

attributes.title: I wish I could leave 0 stars
attributes.review:
🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟 GO GO GO WHO'S NEXT 🦈🐋🦈🐋🦈🐋🦈🐋🦈🐋🦈🐋🦈🐋
this app actually tried to kill me it came out of my iPad and grabbed me by the throat and tried to make me vote for him but the truth is I’m voting for rody rich I mean like the app was telling me to not use TikTok

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: This is the worst app. It glitches all the time. It hardly ever lets me open the app. And when I do open the app its blank and I see or use the app at all. I 100% don’t recommend this app.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: While the app was downloading, which took forever, my phone was absolutely unusable and wouldn’t send or receive any kind of message. I do not recommend.

attributes.title: Russia
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it not only took 27 hours!!!! but it also was not in English once I downloaded. It was in Russian!! I’ve never once chosen a different language setting. SCARY! Scandal! I hope Russians don’t own this app. Be careful everyone.
